artist: Artist: Mark Beard; Author: Harry Kondoleon; Publisher: Vincent FitzGerald & Company, New York
creditline: Gift of funds from John E. Andrus III
description: yellow-covered book; text of a play with color etchings and lithographs interspersed; three figural cut-outs (cut off above the knees) included after fold-out landscape near center; another fold-out section near end; black clamshell box included (not lettered)
medium: Color etchings, color lithographs, letterpress; bound volume
provenance: (Priscilla Juvelis, Cambridge, Mass.); sold to MIA, 2004.
signed: Signed by artist and author on colophon page, in red ink: Harry Kondoleon / Mark Beard
title: The Côte d'Azur Triangle
